sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-col
            md="12"
            sm="12">
            <v-form @submit.prevent="submitForm"
                ref="form"
                v-model="valid">
                <v-sheet>
                    <v-card
                        flat
                        outlined

                        tile>
                        <v-text-field
                            v-model="phase.name"

                            :rules="[rules.required]"
                            class="rounded-0"
                            label="Phase Name"
                            type="text"

                            required>
                        </v-text-field>
                        <!-- <v-card-subtitle>{{ phase.name}}</v-card-subtitle> -->
                    </v-card>
                </v-sheet>
            </v-form>
        </v-col>
        <v-btn
            class="secondary black--text text-capitalize ml-4 mb-4"
            type="submit"
            :disabled="!valid"
            depressed
            tile>
            <v-icon class="mr-2">mdi-account-multiple-plus</v-icon>
            Add the Person
        </v-btn>
    </v-row>


</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PhaseCard',
    props: {
        phase: Object,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            phase_name: '',
            rules: {
                required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        submitForm() {
            console.log(this.phase)
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
